title: Belcourt -  2 BDRM - Garden Level - At Cheesman Park - Avail 8/10
posting_body: ['BELCOURT  (Cheeseman Park)', '902 Lafayette Street', 'Denver, CO  80218', 'View the Belcourt Apartments Video Here:', '<URL>', 'Quiet building - GREAT location', '750 SqFt/ 2 Bedroom - 1 Bath', 'Garden Level Unit', 'Ample amount of closets -- Quaint building a lot of character', 'Quiet building perfect location -- Full kitchen and full bathroom', 'Hardwood floors in Livingroom - Carpet in Bedrooms', 'Gas Stove/oven - Full Fridge - Dishwasher', 'Resident pays unit electric plus building utilities', 'Walk to Cheesman Park & shopping', '*** Non Smoking Building', '1 year lease', 'Cat ok with additional $300/security deposit', '$1495/month - $1000/Security Deposit', 'AVAILABLE:  August 10th', '* PLEASE CALL US TO SCHEDULE A SHOWING', 'We show units everyday except Sundays.', 'We have many buildings in and around the Capitol Hill area in Denver.', 'SEARCH OUR DENVER APARTMENTS FOR RENT DATABASE:', 'Search Denver Apartments For Rent Map', 'Search Denver Apartments For Rent by Size', 'Search Denver Apartments For Rent by Price', 'Search Denver Apartments For Rent that Allow Pets', '** View Photos and Videos of Denver Apartments For Rent', 'Visit: <URL> NOW!', 'Brownstone Realty LTD', '789 Sherman Street, Suite 320', 'Denver, CO 80203', 'show contact info']
